pageContext.claim: “I can't get Nancy Pelosi or Chuck Schumer to do anything for the dreamers. They will do nothing for the dreamers. They don't care about the dreamers.”
pageContext.analysis: Weeks before these remarks, the Democratic-controlled House passed an updated version of the Dream Act. Trump rescinded DACA protections for immigrants and Senate Republicans say the new version of the Dream Act pushed by Speaker Nancy Pelosi is unworkable. It's one thing to say the Democrats' solution is unworkable, but Trump falsely claimed Pelosi and Schumer are doing nothing.
